name: whatdoeslambdasupport.com
description: An autogenerated static website to show what JavaScript functionality is supported out of the box with AWS Lambda with node.js'

scripts.deploy: yarn deploy:importTestFiles && yarn deploy:installAppDependencies && yarn deploy:s3 && yarn deploy:package && yarn deploy:deploy
scripts.deploy:package: aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yml --output-template-file template.deployed.yml --s3-bucket deploy.whatdoeslambdasupport.com
scripts.test: rm -rf dist/ && yarn deploy:importTestFiles && yarn deploy:installAppDependencies && node index.js

author: Coffee and Code <info@coffeeandcode.com>
